game.name: Train Simulator: DB BR633
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The DB633 as recreated for Train Simulator Classic by RSSLO captures the efficient, modern design and operation of this up-to-date passenger train, with operable PZB and SIFA, as well as station name displays which can be customised if you create your own scenarios.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The DB633 as recreated for Train Simulator Classic by RSSLO captures the efficient, modern design and operation of this up-to-date passenger train, with operable PZB and SIFA, as well as station name displays which can be customised if you create your own scenarios.
